page.title: 05Continued
page.content: First of all we have {Maths} and at half past ten we have middle playtime and I have a biscuit. Middle play finishes at a quarter to eleven. After play we usually do {English} work. At 11.50 we pack up and put away the tables and chairs. We go to the toilet and wash our hands. Then I go to the library and sit down on the carpet and we practice our times table with our teacher. At twelve o' clock we lead into the top classroom and have our dinner. I have sandwiches and a cake. I have a yogurt or something else afterwards. Playtime finishes at one o' clock and we go downstairs to the spare room and sing some{songs.}We go to the top room and do activities like drawing, colouring, crayoning, painting and colage.
